note: manual pre paration, product design, and testing; Cathy Johnson edited the manual, and assisted in product testing and the editing of the data files; Tim Nixon designed the game graphics; Marilyn Marr created the drawings for the manual.
title: DeBry programmed the Apple version in FORTH and assembly languages; James Densmore programmed the IBM version in FORTH and assembly languages; Julie Baumgartner served as product manager, wrote many of the data files, and aided in the product's design; Faye Schwartz assisted in writing the data files
